ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) package frozen cauliflower and broccoli
instructions: Melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat. Stir in the onion, and cook until browned. Place the chicken in the pot, and cover with water. Bring to a boil, and cook 45 minutes, until the chicken is cooked and meat is easily removed from the bone.
Remove the chicken legs from the stock, and debone. Skim stock, and return meat to the pot.
Mix the barley and macaroni into the pot. Stir in the cauliflower and broccoli, corn, tomatoes, and tomato sauce. Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes, or until barley is done.
title: Daddy's Sloppy Soup
